select id, name, major, count, trunc(rate) as rate, nvl(file_uuid, '0.png') as file_uuid from (select id, name, major, count, rate from (select id, name, major, count, rate from (select des_id, count(*) as count from review group by des_id) a,
(select id, name, major, avg(rate) as rate from designer d, review r where d.id = r.des_id
and cut_yn = 'Y'
and perm_yn = 'Y'
and dye_yn = 'Y'
and makeup_yn = 'Y'
group by id, name, major) b where id = des_id order by rate desc) where rownum <= 3 ) left join (select file_uuid , des_id from files where file_state = 'pro') f on id = f.des_id order by rate desc
select m.id, name, gender, location, md.MAKEUP_YN, md.CUT_YN, md.PERM_YN, md.DYE_YN from mem_detail md, member m where md.id = m.id and m.id = #{id}

select in1.* , nvl(f.file_uuid, '0.png') as file_uuid from ( select * from ( select d.id , d.name , d.major ,count(*) as count from CONSULTING_HISTORY c join des_course dc on c.cour_no = dc.cour_no join designer d on dc.id = d.id where (major_gender = #{gender} or major_gender = 'ALL') and (
makeup_yn = 'Y'
or
cut_yn = 'Y'
or
perm_yn = 'Y'
or
dye_yn = 'Y'
) group by d.id , d.name , d.major order by 4 desc ) where rownum =1 ) in1 left join( select file_uuid , des_id from files where file_state = 'pro' ) f on in1.id = f.des_id

select inSq.*, nvl(file_uuid, '0.png') as file_uuid from (select id, name, major, trunc(rate) as rate from (select id, name, major, avg(rate) as rate from designer d, review r where d.id = r.des_id and (major_gender = #{gender} or major_gender = 'ALL') and (
makeup_yn = 'Y'
or
cut_yn = 'Y'
or
perm_yn = 'Y'
or
dye_yn = 'Y'
) group by id, name, major order by 4 desc) where rownum = 1) inSq left join (select file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state = 'pro') f on inSq.id = f.des_id
select major as keyword, category from (SELECT major, 'major' as category from designer) union (select name, 'name' from designer)
